instructions: This file maps YouTube video IDs to Why Racing Events. Use the 'recommended' object to get the best/most recent video for each event page. Replit can use this to automatically embed videos.

cssToAdd: .video-section { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa 0%, white 100%); padding: 60px 5%; text-align: center; } .video-section h2 { font-size: 2rem; color: var(--brand-blue, #00205B); margin-bottom: 15px; } .video-section .video-subtitle { color: #666; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 1.1rem; } .video-container { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(0, 32, 91, 0.15); } .video-container iframe { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border: none; } .video-cta { margin-top: 30px; } .video-cta a { display: inline-block; background: var(--brand-red, #E31837); color: white; padding: 14px 32px; font-weight: 700; text-transform: uppercase; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 14px; transition: 0.3s; } .video-cta a:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 6px 25px rgba(227, 24, 55, 0.4); }
